house_listing.house_description: Oceanfront - your own private balcony to enjoy the ocean, the boats, & all the boardwalk activity. Efficiency kitchen. Family activity center, rooftop swimming pool. Restaurants, fishing, museums, golf & nightspots nearby. Busch gardens & colonial williamsburg close. Member interval international.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Cable TV, Contemporary Style, Fenced
